eprosima::rpc::strategy::ThreadPoolStrategy

eprosima::rpc::strategy::ThreadPoolStrategy Class Reference
[Strategies]

This class implements a thread pool strategy. The server schedules the incoming requests in a free thread of the thread pool. More...

#include <ThreadPoolStrategy.h>

Inherits eprosima::rpc::strategy::ServerStrategy.

ServerStrategyImpl * getImpl ()
 Gets the implementation of the strategy using Boost library.

Detailed Description

This class implements a thread pool strategy. The server schedules the incoming requests in a free thread of the thread pool.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

eprosima::rpc::strategy::ThreadPoolStrategy::ThreadPoolStrategy ( unsigned int  threadCount = FASTRPC_MIN_THREADS_DEFAULT  ) 

Default constructor.

Parameters:
threadCount Number of threads the thread pool will manage. Default value: 5.
